title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1263.43 - Metered parking areas
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1263.43 - Metered parking areas

State Regulations
(a) A
metered parking rate for a 30 minute period or fraction thereof shall be............ $.25
(b) In addition to
the above, Airport Parking Company of America provides a valet parking service
at a flat rate of $2 for the valet service, plus the following parking rate: $2.00 for each 12 hours or fraction thereof; 15 percent Newark city tax on
parking charge only. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1263.43

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
